result.title: Consumer perception - Germany
result.description: The report will focus on description of perception, purchasing habits and preferences of German consumers towards seabass and seabream products. The deliverable D5.12 will provide the integral part for the following tasks in the formation of the marketing plan and strategies for seabass and seabream products on the German market.

result.title: Estimated genetic parameters and Low-density genome scan for SNPs associated with VNN resistance in sea bream
result.description: Design and conduct experiments for VNN in sea bream which is currently considered as a high priority threat to the aquaculture industry A lowcost SNP set will be used to reconstruct family relationships and to estimate genetic parameters heritabilities and genetic correlations for resistance to VNN in larval and juvenile sea bream and response to nodavirus vaccination in juveniles GWAS and LDLA will carried out based on the same SNP data to identify loci associated with resistance to VNN response to vaccination

result.title: New vaccines
result.description: A new vaccine against betanodavirus will be produced. This vaccine will cover the highest number of genotypes and genotype combinations affecting seabass but also seabream and also improving the efficacy and the protection. Also an improved vaccine against Pasteurellosis, with higher efficacy and extended protection will be produced.

result.title: Best therapeutics practices for Mediterranean farmed fish
result.description: A guideline document on best practical therapeutic management of the most relevant diseases of seabream and seabass will be produced to be distributed to the farming and feedstuff industries. This guideline will include bath treatments and treatments using medicated feedstuffs

result.title: Main Report on Italian Market
result.description: The report will provide description of the structure of the Italian market for seabass and seabream products. The main elements of the analysis will include evaluation of the market conditions, products supply chain, overview of trade and existing market activities for seabass and seabream products in Italy. In addition, availability of seabass and seabream products in the Italian retail and Ho-Re-Ca and expected market development will constitute an important part of the deliverable D5.1, representing a necessary background for understanding of market conditions.

result.title: Analysis of family and genomic variation of feed efficiency
result.description: Develop a protocol to estimate heritability of individual feed efficiency and its genetic correlation with growth in gilthead seabream reared in individual aquaria Validate individual measurements with fish to be tested for group feed efficiency after completion of the individual challenge Estimate the heritability of individual feed efficiency with the use of the SNP tool and genetic correlation with growth will be estimated using performances of fish grown in commercial conditions
